about_the_game:
Get ready to dive into explosive action and pure adrenaline with Guns Demons, the vehicular combat game that redefines the genre. In this thrilling universe, cars don't just race—they're armed with a devastating array of firearms, ready to unleash chaos on the road.

Game Features:

Story Mode: Embark on an epic campaign filled with action. Battle hordes of enemies and completes objectives as you save the world from the dark future it is facing.

Arcade Mode: Jump straight into the action with quick, frenetic challenges. Test your skills in various scenarios and prove who the true road warrior is.

Online Mode: Face off against players from around the globe in high-speed combat. Customize your car with a variety of weapons and upgrades, and compete in thrilling multiplayer battles where only the strongest survive.

Heavy-metal: Enjoy the action with heavy-metal themes that will accompany the destruction of your games.

Car Customization: You can fully customize your car to make it uniquely yours. Choose your favorite model and personalize it by changing the chassis color and wheel designs. With a vast palette of colors and a variety of patterns, you can create a vehicle that truly reflects your style. Stand out on the track with a car that’s a perfect blend of performance and personality!

Create your own online server: The fun never stops with Guns Demons because you don't depend on external servers that always end up closing. In Guns Demons you create your own server or you can join other players' servers. Therefore you don't have to worry that at some point the servers will close and you won't be able to play online anymore. Here online fun is guaranteed until the end of the world.

Guns Demons combines the excitement of vehicular combat with intense, addictive gameplay. Are you ready to take the wheel and dominate the battlefield?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: i7 4790k or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 | AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: i9 9900k or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 3060 | AMD Radeon HD 6870 or greater
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
